targets.query:
import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Prague")

from(bucket: "Kalužovi")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Teplota venku" and r._value != 0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Maximální teplota"})
  |> keep(columns : ["_time","Maximální teplota"])

import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Prague")

from(bucket: "Kalužovi")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Teplota venku" and r._value != 0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: mean, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Průměrná teplota"})
  |> keep(columns : ["_time","Průměrná teplota"])

import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Prague")


from(bucket: "Kalužovi")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Teplota venku" and r._value != 0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: min, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Minimální teplota"})
  |> keep(columns : ["_time","Minimální teplota"])

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Prague")

  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)
  |> mean()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Maximální teplota"})
  |> keep(columns : ["_time","Maximální teplota"])

panels.title: Průměrná denní teplota za posledních 7 dní

targets.query:
import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Prague")

from(bucket: "Kalužovi")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Měřič.*/ and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič Grid" and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič FVE" and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič Dům" and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič baterie")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, offset: 3m, fn: spread, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._measurement }))

import "timezone"
import "regexp"
import "join"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Prague")

spotrebice = from(bucket: "Kalužovi")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Měřič.*/ and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič Grid" and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič FVE" and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič Dům" and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič výbíjení baterie" and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič nabíjení baterie" and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič baterie")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, offset: 3m, fn: spread, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode:"by")
  |> sum()

ostatni = from(bucket: "Kalužovi")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Měřič Dům")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, offset: 3m, fn: spread, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode:"by")

//spotrebice
join.time(method: "left", left: spotrebice, right: ostatni, as: (l, r) => ({l with _value: r._value - l._value}))
  |> group()

import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Prague")

from(bucket: "Kalužovi")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Měřič.*/ and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič Grid" and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič FVE" and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič Dům" and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič baterie")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, offset: 3m, fn: spread, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._measurement }))

import "timezone"
import "regexp"
import "join"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Prague")

spotrebice = from(bucket: "Kalužovi")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Měřič.*/ and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič Grid" and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič FVE" and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič Dům" and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič výbíjení baterie" and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič nabíjení baterie" and r["_measurement"] != "Měřič baterie")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, offset: 3m, fn: spread, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode:"by")
  |> sum()

ostatni = from(bucket: "Kalužovi")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Měřič Dům")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, offset: 3m, fn: spread, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode:"by")

//spotrebice
join.time(method: "left", left: spotrebice, right: ostatni, as: (l, r) => ({l with _value: r._value - l._value}))
  |> group()
